attributes.action: apply the the same tax to cheap imports as thay do to the uk to give manufacturing a chance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
manufaturinging in uk disavanataged because it has to compeat with imports that have:-
1.no minimam wage.
2.no health and safty.
2.no enviroment policys.
3.no stelth taxes that give a total tax of over 50%.
As there pollution is our pollution
tax tham a carbon tax plus 50% and give us a chance or the uk will soon manufacture nothing.
